_note: Tham số tương đương với application.json để so sánh công bằng

detection._comment_textDetLimitType: Limit type: 'max' = longest side <= limitSideLen, 'min' = shortest side >= limitSideLen
detection._comment_textDetLimitSideLen: Image side length limit (pixels). Higher value = more detail but slower
detection._comment_textDetThresh: Pixel detection threshold. Lower = more detections but may include noise
detection._comment_textDetBoxThresh: Box threshold. Only keep boxes with average score > this value
detection._comment_textDetUnclipRatio: Box expansion ratio. Higher = wider boxes

recognition._comment_textRecScoreThresh: Score threshold. Only keep results with score > this value

runtime._comment_cpuThreads: Number of CPU threads for inference

pipeline._comment_useDocOrientationClassify: Whether to use document orientation classification
pipeline._comment_useTextlineOrientation: Whether to use textline orientation classification

output._comment_saveVisualization: Save visualization images with bounding boxes

debug._comment_enabled: Enable detailed timing logging to CSV file

warmup._comment: Run dummy images before benchmark to warm up the model
